items.title: JSPM 4.0 Release
items.content_html: JSPM 4.0 release post featuring a refreshed local development workflow for modern standards

items.title: JavaScript Integrity Manifests with Import Maps
items.content_html: Using the new 'integrity' feature for import maps provides a new integrity manifest security model for JS modules on the web

items.title: Deprecating jspm.dev
items.content_html: With import maps fully supported in browsers, the JSPM project is moving to only support import map CDN workflows via the ga.jspm.io CDN, while jspm.dev is being deprecated over a two year timeframe.

items.title: JSPM CLI Relaunch - Import Map Package Management
items.content_html: Relaunching the JSPM CLI as an Import Map Package Manager

items.title: teleportHQ JSPM Sponsorship
items.content_html: teleportHQ sponsors JSPM's ES Module CDN workflows

items.title: Import Maps Release & Module CDN Launch
items.content_html: Import maps have just landed in Chrome 89 and a new ga.jspm.io module CDN has been launched to support these new workflows
